text: Catherine Elizabeth Wannan Steel (born 31 May 1973) is Professor of Classics at the University of Glasgow. Steel is an expert on the Roman Republic, the writings of Cicero, and Roman oratory. She studied in Corpus Christi College, Oxford and was awarded the First Craven Scholarship in 1993, and then the Chancellor's Prize for Latin Prose in 1994. She was elected to a Senior Scholarship in 1997. In 2004, she participated in the BBC Radio 4 In Our Time episode on the Roman Republic.In Our Time Archive: History. BBC Radio 4. Retrieved 21 May 2015. She participated in a further episode of In Our Time, in January 2018, on Cicero. Her book Cicero, Rhetoric and Empire is held in 1062 libraries worldwide. ==Selected publications== *Community and Communication: Oratory and Politics in Republican Rome.
